duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate activities and responsibilities of the Graduate Medical Education Committee in compliance with ACGME program requirements.
Maintain and update GME office ACGME accreditation and GMEC records for accreditation programs.
Assist in the preparation and update of all required GME policies.
Manage monthly GMEC Agenda and meetings, ensuring coverage of all GMEC responsibilities in line with ACGME requirements and institutional policies.
Function as a liaison between the program directors, residency coordinators, and participating sites.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in Public Health, Public Administration, Business Administration, Social Work, Psychology or Rehabilitation Counseling (or equivalent combination of education and experience)
